info.name: shortest rainbow / hue (93 ch)
info.description: This one is indeed a close approximation of Hue( x ) function , with x = length , here.

renderpass.code:
#define mainImage(O,U)      \
    O.xyz = iResolution;    \
    O = .6 + .6 * cos( 6.3 *  length(U+U-O.xz)/O.y  + vec4(0,23,21,0)  )
renderpass.name: Image
